programme.title: John Lennon’s assassination
programme.short_synopsis: Will the death of John Lennon have an effect on the gun rights lobby in America?
programme.medium_synopsis: The shooting of John Lennon on the 8th December 1980 sparks a debate over the need for national gun control law in America.
